Class ClusteredCacheQueryImpl

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Object>, CacheQuery
public class ClusteredCacheQueryImpl
extends CacheQueryImpl

A extension of CacheQueryImpl used for distributed queries.

Since:
5.1
Author:
Israel Lacerra
